$description: Breadcrumb component tokens. Breadcrumbs show the user's location in a site hierarchy and enable navigation to parent pages. These tokens compose primitive tokens into breadcrumb-specific configurations. Use breadcrumbs for: multi-level navigation, file system paths, category hierarchies. ACCESSIBILITY: Use nav landmark with aria-label='Breadcrumb', mark current page with aria-current='page'.

fontSize.$description: Separator font size (14px). Matches item font size for visual consistency.

margin.$description: Horizontal margin around separator (8px). Space between breadcrumb items and separator character.

fontSize.$description: Breadcrumb item font size (14px). Standard size for secondary navigation text.

default.$description: Default breadcrumb item font weight. Regular weight for ancestor/link items.

active.$description: Active (current page) breadcrumb item font weight. Medium weight distinguishes current page from ancestor links.

lineHeight.$description: Breadcrumb item line height. Compact line height for single-line navigation.

padding.$description: Breadcrumb item padding for touch targets and click area.

horizontal.$description: Horizontal padding around breadcrumb items (4px). Subtle padding increases click/tap area without changing visual spacing.

vertical.$description: Vertical padding on breadcrumb items (4px). Increases touch target height for better mobile usability.
